Description:
Shuffle two cards from the Star Spawn deck into the encounter deck and delete the rest.
Shuffle and place 7 locations from the bottom of the summit deck. Then, shuffle Central Spire into the top 3 cards of the summit deck.
If you don't have [i]The creature was defeated[/i] in your campaign log, shuffle the three Still Behind Yous into the encounter deck.  If you do, delete them and The Inescapable.
Name: Notecard
